{"step_by_step_thinking": "The relevant documents describe direct bonding of orthodontic brackets to enamel using composite materials. The maximum average bond strength was 121 Kg per square centimeter, and the attachment of the adhesive to the bracket material is the bottleneck of the direct-bonding procedure.
